metadata.name: Book of Gorr: Volume 1
metadata.created_by: Prince Ham Doe and Yung Serf
metadata.description: Book of Gorr: Volume 1 is the first installment of a manga series set in the world of WAGDIE. The story follows three protagonists, Ham Doe, Danneth, and Madnick, as they embark on a journey to find the prophet Serf. Throughout the story, readers will encounter various characters, kingdoms, and families, each with their own unique characteristics and conflicts. A surprise guest makes an appearance, playing a significant role in this volume, setting the stage for future conflicts and story arcs. Overall, Volume 1 serves as an introduction to the series, introducing readers to the rich and immersive world and its inhabitants.

attributes.value: Love Is Not A Side Quest
